mdRecord.dcterms:title: Ledger Book of Dr. Thomas Howard, 1861-1869
mdRecord.dcterms:description: The ledger book of Dr. Thomas Howard from March 1861-January 1868. In the ledger are the records of each patient's name detailing when they payed their bill, the amount, and how they payed. How payment was received could include "Cash" or "4 Bushels Buckwheat" or other goods, with an equivalent dollar amount.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Doctors
Record keeping
Records (Information)
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. University Libraries
